metadata.prompt: A fun, animated sorting game. A conveyor belt has various tools on it. A giant robotic arm sorts them into two bins: one labeled "KEEPERS (Multi-Use)" and one labeled "TOSS (Single-Use)".
A close-up shot showcasing the texture and quality of multi-use materials. A shiny pair of metal shears, a sparkling glass bowl, and a sturdy hard plastic comb are arranged beautifully.
A graphic with three icons: a magnet (for metal), a glass cup (for glass), and a plastic block (for plastic). Text below reads: "Hard, Non-Porous Materials".
A split-screen comparison. On the left, a pair of metal tweezers with a large green checkmark. On the right, a wooden cuticle stick with a large red 'X'.
A satisfying shot of a variety of multi-use tools (combs, clips, guards) being submerged in a disinfectant bath.
A shot of a perfectly organized drawer in a salon, showing clean, disinfected multi-use tools neatly arranged and ready for the next service.
A professional stylist selecting a clean, disinfected tool from their organized station, ready to begin a service on a client.
